title: Hundred Years' War
description:
Series of conflicts between England and France over claims to the French throne; Joan of Arc played a decisive role in the later stages.
Key battles: Crécy, Poitiers, Agincourt; ultimately strengthened French national identity.

title: World War I
description: Global war centered in Europe that introduced industrial-scale trench warfare, chemical weapons, and massive military casualties; reshaped borders and set stage for WWII.

title: World War II
description: Global conflict involving most of the world's nations; atrocities including the Holocaust, major battles across Europe, Africa, and the Pacific; resulted in the United Nations' founding.

title: Russo-Ukrainian War
description: Conflict began in 2014 with the annexation of Crimea and escalated in 2022 with a full-scale invasion; ongoing humanitarian crisis and major geopolitical consequences.
